chunks.text: In the past we haven't treated sleep with much importance.
We often in fact encourage people to sacrifice sleep to get that extra assignment done or to do a little bit extra.
However we found in the last 30 years that sleep is absolutely vital to our functioning.
We've found that every single process in the human body benefits from good sleep.
And tragically we have a generation of people that are very tired and exhausted and it has huge consequences for our well-being.
